Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Campbell
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, California, Madison, Western, & Jackson, due to street blockage near Jackson/Campbell.

Allow extra travel time.
